<a id="AudioEffectLowShelfFilter"></a>

# AudioEffectLowShelfFilter

**Inherits:** [AudioEffectFilter](AudioEffectFilter.md) **\<** [AudioEffect](AudioEffect.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Adds a low-shelf filter to the audio bus.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Reduces all frequencies below the [AudioEffectFilter.cutoff_hz](AudioEffectFilter.md#AudioEffectFilter_property_cutoff_hz).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->
